title: 2001 Isuzu Flatbed Truck

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, Death Certificate, Transfer without Probate, and smog certificate will be mailed approximately 1-2 weeks after auction removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. Buyer accepts they are fully responsible for all aspects of transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to the California DMV.
